verbs.description: [ARG1: US President Donald Trump] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: fit for his job] , the speaker of Iran ’s parliament said on Wednesday as lawmakers set fire to the Stars and Stripes while chanting ' Death to America . '
